products.name: CASIO MEN | QUARTZ (PIN) | METAL WIRE (MTP-1335D-7AVDF)
CASIO MTP-1384D-1AVDF | MEN | QUARTZ (PIN) | METAL WIRE
desc: With a robust black Casio MTP-1384D-1AVDF dial, delicately thinned Roman numeral hour markers and hands that stand out against the digital background, an elegant metal strap, the watch withstands depth. 10ATM is suitable for water activities except diving

products.name: CASIO B640WD-1AVDF | MEN | PLASTIC GLASS | QUARTZ (PIN) | METAL WIRE
desc: The Casio B640WD-1AVDF model with an electronic dial with many functions brings many conveniences to the user, creating a masculine personality with a silver metal strap.

products.name: CASIO AQ-S810W-1A4VDF | MEN | PLASTIC GLASS | TOUGH SOLAR (LIGHT ENERGY) | RUBBER STRAP
desc: The impressive Casio AQ-S810W-1A4VDF model with Tough Solar (Light Energy) technology, the case is designed in the shape of gray-toned edges combined with a black rubber strap to create a fishy look. dynamic feature.

products.name: CASIO EFR-526L-2AVUDF | MEN | QUARTZ (PIN) | LEATHER STRAP
desc: Casio EFR-526L-2AVUDF watch with stylish men's design, large clear hands and markers on a sporty blue background, date window at 3 o'clock, blue leather strap Create a trendy and youthful look.

products.name: CASIO MTP-V006GL-7BUDF | MEN | QUARTZ (PIN) | LEATHER STRAP
desc: Casio MTP-V006GL-7BUDF watch with a traditional round dial, gold color of the bezel surrounding the white of the numeral base, the center of the dial has 3 yellow hands and black Roman numeral markers.

products.name: OP M | QUARTZ (PIN) | SAPPHIRE GLASS | METAL WIRE (89322DMS-T-HX)
desc: Olym Pianus (Olympia Star) fashion men's watch 89322DMS-T-HX has a unique and luxurious design, blue beaded bezel on the 4 corners, delicate blue beaded numerals, also 1 calendar small day.

products.name: Casio MTP-1302D-7A1VDF | Men | Quartz (Battery) | Metal Band
desc: Product Number: MTP-1302D-7A1VDF Made in Japan Gender: Male Glass: Mineral Crystal (Hard Glass) Movement: Quartz (Battery) International Warranty: 1 Year Hai Trieu Warranty: Dial Diameter: 38.5mmDial Thickness: 9.2 mmDial Color: WhiteWater Resistance: 5 ATM Function: Calendar Date Place of manufacture (Depending on batch): China

products.name: Casio MTP-1302D-7A1VDFs | Men | Quartz (Battery) | Metal Band
SEIKO SRZ520P1 | WOMEN | QUARTZ (PIN) | METAL WIRE
desc: Seiko SRZ520P1 version has a stylish appearance with a slim 7mm battery, outstanding luxury for women with a gold-plated metal case.

products.name: SEIKO SUP860P1 | MEN | SOLAR (LIGHT ENERGY) | LEATHER STRAP
desc: The elegant look of the brown leather strap with the hidden grain of the Seiko SUP860P1 men's watch has a modern look when equipped with Solar technology.

products.name: SEIKO SRPA21K1 – MEN – AUTOMATIC (AUTO) – METAL STRAP
desc: The stylish design, the water resistance up to 20 ATM, and the experience of the mechanical movement are the highlights that make the Seiko SRPA21K1 sporty men's watch.

products.name: SEIKO SSA295K1 – MEN – AUTOMATIC (AUTO) – LEATHER STRAP
desc: Seiko SSA295K1 men's watch with a classic design for men, large clear hands and numbers stand out on a formal white background, combined with a brown leather strap to create an elegant nostalgic look.

products.name: SEIKO SUR507P1 – MEN – QUARTZ (PIN) – METAL STRAP – DIAL 40MM
desc: The Seiko SUR507P1 model has a simple design with 3-hand functions, the needle details and the numbered markers are thickly masculine and water resistant up to 10atm.

products.name: CASIO A159WGED-1DF – WOMEN – PLASTIC GLASS – QUARTZ (PIN) – METAL WIRE
desc: The Casio A159WGED-1DF watch model has a simple but equally attractive appearance and sophisticated diamond-encrusted design, creating a seductive fashion for women on the electronic square dial background.

products.name: CASIO A159WAD-1DF – WOMEN – PLASTIC GLASS – QUARTZ (PIN) – METAL LINE
desc: A simple but equally attractive appearance with the sophisticated design of the Casio A159WAD-1DF model studded with diamonds creates a luxurious fashion for women on the electronic square dial background.

products.name: CASIO W-216H-3BVDF – MEN – PLASTIC GLASS – QUARTZ (PIN) – RUBBER STRAP
desc: The Casio W-216H-3BVDF model has a case and strap designed with impact-resistant rubber material, an electronic dial background with many useful functions, creating a youthful and dynamic look for men with personality.

products.name: CASIO EFV-540D-1AVUDF – MEN – QUARTZ (PIN) – METAL WIRE
desc: The Casio EFV-540D-1AVUDF model has a 6-needle design with 3 side knobs with a distinctive appearance of the Edifice series, carrying an elegant sporty style for men and 10ATM water resistance.

products.name: CASIO EFV-540D-1AVUDF – MEN – QUARTZ (PIN) – METAL WIRE
desc: The Casio EFV-540D-1AVUDF model has a 6-needle design with 3 side knobs with a distinctive appearance of the Edifice series, carrying an elegant sporty style for men and 10ATM water resistance.

products.name: CASIO EFR-526D-1AVUDF – MEN – QUARTZ (PIN) – METAL WIRE
desc: Casio EFR-526D-1AVUDF watch with large sporty strong dial, masculine metal band, black dial background and luminous coated hands and hour markers.

products.name: ADIDAS DURAMO SL 2.0 MEN - BLACK BLACK
desc: The adidas Duramo SL 2.0 Shoe is an upgraded version of the much-loved adidas Duramo SL. With LightMotion outsole technology, you'll be able to move with comfort for improved fitness.

With adidas Duramo SL 2.0 you can use it in all daily activities from running, gym, going out, going to work. Especially with an extremely reasonable price, this is a very HOT adidas shoe model this year.

products.name: ADIDAS GRAND COURT BASE SHOES FOR WOMEN - BLACK WHITE
desc: Basic design shoes for fashion lovers- Adidas Grand Court at Myshoes.vn- Genuine Shoes. With these Original designs, you'll never have to worry about your shoes going out of style over the years.
Youthful, dynamic colors easily satisfy your different Outfits. Rubber sole, creating a comfortable feeling when moving.

products.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Mid Metallic Red Sports Shoes 554724-122 Color Combination Size 40.5
desc: The Nike Air Jordan 1 Mid Metallic Red 554724-122 Sneakers are crafted from premium leather with a specially designed hug for directional support and movement support.
The form of the shoe fits well on the foot, the stitches are very delicate and sure to ensure the satisfaction of all customers. Unique and outstanding colors.
Nike sports shoes are always the first choice because of their dynamism, youthfulness, convenience, easy coordination with many outfits and suitable for many different situations.

products.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Mid University Blue Sneakers BQ6472-141 Color Combination Size 37.5
desc: The upper of the Nike Air Jordan 1 Mid University Blue BQ6472-141 Color Coat is made of premium leather with a specially designed hug for directional support and movement support.
Flexible rubber outsole provides grip, soft lining provides comfort for the feet.
The form of the shoe fits well on the foot, the stitches are very delicate and sure to ensure the satisfaction of all customers.
Simple colors are easy to match.
Nike sneakers are always the first choice because of their dynamism, youth, utility, easy coordination with many outfits and suitable for many different situations.

products.name: Nike Renew Run 2 Men's Road Running Shoe CU3504-005 Black Size 41
desc: Nike Renew Run 2 Men's Road Running Shoe CU3504-005 Black is a unique improvement on the running shoes that Nike has released before.
It's made from premium textiles with a specially designed hug for directional support and motion support.
The form of shoes that go up to the foot fits well, the lines of the shoes are extremely delicate and sharp to satisfy every customer.

products.name: Disruptor 2 Premium
desc: A chunky men’s sneaker that redefines bold.
White midsole and molded rubber outsole

products.name: Ray Tracer Contrast Piping
desc: The Ray Tracer in white featuring color contrast piping.
Embroidered logo hits on tongueand quarter
Pull tabs on tongue and heel

products.name: Ray Tracer TR 2 Mid
desc: Gives You a Unique Look When the Temps Drop.
Winter Sneakers Designed for Max Comfort.
Printed, embroidered, and molded logos on tongue, quarter, and back counter
Metal shoelace hooks and round shoelaces
Pull tabs on heel and tongue

products.name: Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Platform Canvas
desc: Inspired by the iconic looks of '90s girl bands, these platform Chucks are sure to turn heads. Canvas can be as refined or edgy as you'd like, while a double-stacked sole takes you higher.

products.name: Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Platform Splatter
desc: Stand tall and stand out in your new favorite platforms. A fresh paint splatter execution adds a splash of expression across the laces, eyerow, and ankle patch. A breathable mesh upper rests on top of a platform sole for added height, with OrthoLite cushioning to keep it comfortable. These Chucks are a work of art.
White midsole and black pinstripe outsole
Paint splatter print on ankle patch, eyerow, and laces

products.name: Converse x Peanuts Chuck Taylor All Star
desc: Converse teams up with the iconic comic strip to bring some lighthearted positivity to the world. This limited-edition Chuck Taylor All Star design pairs the classic canvas with a classic Snoopy and Woodstock moment. Get nostalgic with Converse x Peanuts Chucks.
Limited-edition high-top sneaker with a 12oz classic canvas upper
Converse x Peanuts logo lockup on sockliner and woven tongue label

products.name: SK8-HI Color - Black/Black/White
desc: The Sk8-Hi was introduced in 1978 as Style 38, and showcased the now-iconic Vans Sidestripe on a new, innovative high top silhouette.
As only the second model featuring the recognizable marker formerly known as the “jazz stripe,” the Sk8-Hi brought a whole new look to the Vans family.
Honoring that first legendary high top, the Sk8-Hi is made with sturdy suede and canvas uppers in a variety of classic and unexpected colorways.
This lace-up shoe also includes re-enforced toe caps, supportive padded collars, and signature rubber waffle outsoles.

products.name: SK8-HI Color - Pore Royale/True White
desc: The Sk8-Hi, the legendary lace-up high top, features sturdy canvas and suede uppers, re-enforced toecaps to withstand repeated wear, padded collars for support and flexibility, and signature rubber waffle outsoles.

products.name: Ultrarange EXO SE
desc: Always ready for the unexpected We believe that adventure begins when things go sideways, so we developed a shoe that would not only stand up to the journey, but keep you comfortable in the most uncomfortable of situations. Armed with a co-molded UltraCush midsole, updated RapidWeld detailing, a lightweight, die-cut rubber outsole, and a breathable Old Skool-inspired upper, this is the UltraRange—evolved. The UltraRange EXO SE is made with special edition suede, textile, and synthetic uppers.
FULL SUPPORT - EXO Skeleton provides built-in support across the toes and medial sidewall, with a heel lock for a secure fit.
ULTRACUSH® FOR COMFORT - The co-molded UltraCush® Lite midsole increases comfort, not weight.
ALL-TERRAIN GRIP - Full rubber-wrapped reverse waffle lug outsoles improve traction and flexibility.
INCREASED BREATHABILITY - An UltraCush® tongue with breathability ports offers superior airflow.

How to store and clean for stuffed animals: Put the product in a cool place, avoid moisture because the product has a very high hygroscopicity.

Wash products often, avoid leaving them for too long (2-3 months washing once). Should be washed with soaps specialized for washing baby clothes to be able to preserve the smoothness of teddy bears for the longest time.

For small products: Place them in a pillowcase/laundry bag and tie tightly and wash as usual. For large teddy bear products: Make a small slit on the product, remove all the cotton inside, then wash/dry the outer shell of the product. Let it dry and then stuff it back up again.
Dry in the sun and wait for the product to dry completely before bringing it home

products.name: Bat Trang Teapot - Terracotta Teapot Set - An Tu Tuc Teapot Set
desc: Forged from precious soil of Trang An nature, crystallized metal minerals such as kaolin, clay and alluvium.
The soil is left to incubate for more than 5 years, thoroughly filtered and ground for 72 hours continuously (3 times the time it takes to grind the soil to make ordinary kettles).
The standard treated kettle faucet makes the water flow cut off easily and without spillage.
The filter is manually drilled with more than 100 small holes, when pouring the tea will not clog and create a beautiful circular flow.
The kettle is heated in an oven with a temperature of over 1200 degrees Celsius, creating a good, shiny kettle. and smooth.

products.name: Astronaut Spaceman
Textured Leather Cap Toe Men's Shoe
desc: Always ready for the unexpected We believe that adventure begins when things go sideways, so we developed a shoe that would not only stand up to the journey, but keep you comfortable in the most uncomfortable of situations. Armed with a co-molded UltraCush midsole, updated RapidWeld detailing, a lightweight, die-cut rubber outsole, and a breathable Old Skool-inspired upper, this is the UltraRange—evolved. The UltraRange EXO SE is made with special edition suede, textile, and synthetic uppers.
FULL SUPPORT - EXO Skeleton provides built-in support across the toes and medial sidewall, with a heel lock for a secure fit.
ULTRACUSH® FOR COMFORT - The co-molded UltraCush® Lite midsole increases comfort, not weight.
ALL-TERRAIN GRIP - Full rubber-wrapped reverse waffle lug outsoles improve traction and flexibility.
INCREASED BREATHABILITY - An UltraCush® tongue with breathability ports offers superior airflow.
